sn37.4:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato matugamo yebhuyyena kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
sn37.4:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo pubbanhasamayam maccheramalapariyutthitena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati.
sn37.4:1.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato matugamo yebhuyyena kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati”ti.
